main event: Mrs. A. W. Hogan and her husband reported witnessing a bright light in the sky on the evening of 7 Dec 60 in Waynesville, Ohio.
interesting points: The light was described as much brighter than stars or planets., The light was observed to hover before suddenly accelerating and disappearing from view., The sighting lasted for about 15 minutes., The light was accompanied by a rumbling sound., The object was noted for its unusual characteristics and was deemed potentially extraterrestrial in nature.
sighted object: a bright light in the sky
witness description: Mrs. A. W. Hogan, a resident of Waynesville, and her husband.
